titleStmt.title: The lamentacyon of a Christe[n] agai[n]st the citye of London for some certaine greate vyces vsed theri[n].

publicationStmt.publisher: Impri[n]ted [by A. Scoloker and W. Seres],
publicationStmt.date: i[n] ye yere of our Lord m.d.xlviii. [1548]
